concept-wr.title: Ephemeral Dimensioning for Storage Nodes
concept-wr.shortdesc: To determine the logical disk capacity requirement for ephemeral volumes for virtual machines specifically configured to use ephemeral volumes on the storage nodes, calculate the total storage for ephemeral volumes required to be supported plus some margin to handle growth.

conbody.p: This does not include VMs and ephemeral volumes that use the default ephemeral storage on the compute nodes.

sl.sli: Ephemeral Storage Requirement = N * AvgVolSize + Margin
N = Total number of volumes required
AvgVolSize = Average volume size on disk in GB (note that sparse files are used)
